description: Aspose.Slides is a PowerPoint management library for working with Microsoft PowerPoint files without using Microsoft PowerPoint. It allows developers to work with PPT, PPS, POT, PPTX, PPSX, POTX and ODP files on ASP.NET web applications, web services and Windows applications.
releaseNotes:
This release introduces the features, enhancements and bug fixes as detailed below:
	

Investigations:
SLIDESNET-34339	Facing Performance Issue due to AddTable() method of PPTX
SLIDESNET-34343	Aspose.Slides for .NET takes time to process and save presentation

Bugs:	
SLIDESNET-33506	Incorrect position of a chart labels
SLIDESNET-33992	Getting plot area properties return NaN
SLIDESNET-33998	Bold text is appearing as normal in generated chart thumbnails
SLIDESNET-33999	Value axis title is rendered incorrectly as in actual slide
SLIDESNET-34025	Slide theme image is replaced by a normal image in slide
SLIDESNET-34100	LineWidth returns NaN on accessing the presentation shape
SLIDESNET-34111	Chart legends get disturbed on slide cloning
SLIDESNET-34153	NullReference Exception on removing animation from presentation and saving it
SLIDESNET-34181	Table top border lost on adding row in table
SLIDESNET-34199	IndexOutofRangeException while reading the chart data
SLIDESNET-34234	Exception: "Placeholder index must be between 0 and 7" obtained on accessing PPT
SLIDESNET-34237	The date time format changed in generated tiff image
SLIDESNET-34246	NullReferenceException on generating the slide thumbnail
SLIDESNET-34248	Chart data labels are improperly rendered in thumbnail
SLIDESNET-34259	NullReference Exception on accessing empty PPT presentation using PresentationEx
SLIDESNET-34261	Nullreference Exception on accessing presentation
SLIDESNET-34292	Chart failed to open in edit mode in Aspose.Slide saved presentation
SLIDESNET-34310	System.OverflowException on generating PDF
SLIDESNET-34318	Nullreference Exception on accessing presentation using PresentationEx
SLIDESNET-34319	Custom property is not returned if the property value is set to -1.12346E9
SLIDESNET-34335	Chart background missing in generated PDF
SLIDESNET-34338	Charts missing in generated PDF
SLIDESNET-34342	System goes to Infinite loop while saving slide to SVG

Sub-task:
SLIDESNET-33855	Chart series line is too bold
summary: Aspose.Slides is a PowerPoint management library for working with Microsoft PowerPoint files without using Microsoft PowerPoint. It allows developers to work with PPT, PPS, POT, PPTX, PPSX, POTX and ODP files on ASP.NET web applications, web services and Windows applications. It allows you to open files and manipulate the elements of the presentation from adding slides and managing variety of shapes and working with text to more complex elements like presentation protection, slide animations, charts and SmartArt rendering.The presentations can be exported to PDF, TIFF, XPS, SVG, PNG, JPEG, BMP or EMF formats.
title: Aspose.Slides for .NET
